name: Edition One Cloud Hopper - No. 485
additionalNotes:
Edition One Cloud Hopper cigars are a collaboration between famous master blender Kyle Gellis (of Warped Cigars fame), and his brother Devin. Their mission was to create a top-quality, yet reasonably priced line of cigars that can be enjoyed anytime of the day. The Gellis brothers accomplished this task
